name: fillet of fish
description: Freshly caught fish.  Makes a passable meal raw.

name: cooked fish
description: Freshly cooked fish.  Very nutritious.

name: human stomach
description: The stomach of a human.  It is surprisingly durable.

name: large human stomach
description: The stomach of a large humanoid creature.  It is surprisingly durable.

name: human flesh
description: Freshly butchered from a human body.

name: cooked creep
description: A freshly cooked slice of some unpleasant person.  Tastes great.

name: chunk of meat
description: Freshly butchered meat.  You could eat it raw, but cooking it is better.

name: scrap of meat
description: This is a tiny scrap of edible meat.  It's not much, but it'll do in a pinch.

name: chunk of mutant meat
description: Meat from a heavily mutated animal.  It looks and smells... mostly normal.  It will probably be safe to eat, if you cook it.

name: scrap of mutant meat
description: A tiny scrap of meat from a heavily mutated animal.  It's not much, and it smells a bit odd, but it's probably safe to eat if cooked.

//: This item should not get any use whatsoever, it is merely conservation of mass and an attractor for carrion.
name: butchery refuse
description: Eugh.  This is a mess of dirt, excreta, connective tissue, and bits of matter like hair and claws, leftover from the butchering process.  Eating it isn't even worth thinking about, but disposing of it might be a concern as it could attract vermin.

name: cooked meat
description: This is a chunk of freshly cooked meat.  It's filling and nutritious, but unseasoned and a bit bland.

name: cooked meat
description: This is a cooked chunk of meat from a mutated animal.  It's filling, but it looks and smells...  a bit odd.

name: cooked scrap of meat
description: A tiny scrap of meat from a heavily mutated animal.  It's not much, and it smells a bit odd, but it's probably safe to eat.

name: raw offal
description: Offal is uncooked internal organs and entrails.  It's filled with essential vitamins, but most people consider it a bit gross unless very carefully prepared.

name: cooked offal
description: This is freshly cooked organ meat and entrails.  It's filled with essential vitamins, but most people consider it a bit gross unless very carefully prepared.

name: pickled offal
description: This is a mass of entrails and organ meat, preserved in brine.  Packed with essential vitamins, and although it looks like a lab specimen, it actually tastes pretty palatable.

name: canned offal
description: Freshly cooked organ meat and entrails, preserved by canning.  Unappetizing, but filled with essential vitamins.

name: stomach
description: The stomach of a woodland creature.  It is surprisingly durable.

name: large stomach
description: The stomach of a large woodland creature.  It is surprisingly durable.

name: meat jerky
description: Salty dried meat that lasts for a long time, but will make you thirsty.

name: mutant jerky
description: Salty dried meat from some mutated creature that lasts for a long time, but will make you thirsty.  It doesn't look or taste quite right.

name: salted fish
description: Salty dried fish that lasts for a long time, but will make you thirsty.

name: jerk jerky
description: Salty dried human flesh that lasts for a long time, but will make you thirsty.

name: smoked meat
description: Tasty meat that has been heavily smoked for preservation.  It could be further smoked to dehydrate it completely.

name: smoked mutant meat
description: Meat that has been heavily smoked for preservation.  The weird taste and color have been mostly covered up by the smoke.  It could be further smoked to dehydrate it completely.

name: smoked fish
description: Tasty fish that has been heavily smoked for long term preservation.  It could be further smoked to dehydrate it completely.

name: smoked sucker
description: A heavily smoked portion of human flesh.  Lasts for a long time and tastes pretty good, if you like that sort of thing.

name: piece of raw lung
description: A portion of lung from an animal.  It's spongy and pink, and spoils very quickly.  It can be a delicacy if properly prepared - but if improperly prepared, it's a chewy lump of flavorless connective tissue.

name: cooked piece of lung
description: Prepared in this way, it's a chewy grayish lump of flavorless connective tissue.  It doesn't look any tastier than it did raw, but the parasites are all cooked out.

name: raw liver
description: The liver from an animal.  Although many dislike the texture, it's one of the more vitamin rich parts of the animal.  It is very good in sausages, but maybe a little less appetizing when cooked on its own.

name: cooked liver
description: Chock full of B-Vitamins!  Cooked liver isn't all that bad, depending on how you feel about the texture, but this is probably the least fancy way to do it.

name: raw brains
description: The brain from an animal.  You wouldn't want to eat this raw...

name: cooked brains
description: Now you can emulate those zombies you love so much!  Preparing brain for eating is challenging, and this doesn't seem to be the best way to do it.

name: raw kidney
description: The kidney from an animal.  Preparing it for cooking is a challenge unless you want the kitchen to smell strongly of urine.

name: cooked kidney
description: No, this is not beans.

name: raw sweetbread
description: Sweetbreads are the thymus or pancreas of an animal.  These are a delicacy, if prepared properly.

name: cooked sweetbread
description: Normally a delicacy, it needs a little... something.

name: blood
description: Blood, possibly that of a human.  Disgusting!

name: bone
description: A bone from some creature or other.  Could be used to make some stuff, like needles.

name: chunk of fat
description: Freshly butchered fat.  You could eat it raw, but it is better used as an ingredient in other foods or projects.

name: tallow
description: A smooth white block of cleaned and rendered animal fat.  It will remain edible for a very long time, and can be used as an ingredient in many foods and projects.

name: lard
description: A smooth white block of dry-rendered animal fat.  It will remain edible for a very long time, and can be used as an ingredient in many foods and projects.

name: chunk of tainted meat
description: Meat that's obviously unhealthy.  You could eat it, but it will poison you.

name: tainted bone
description: A rotten and brittle bone from some unnatural creature or other.  Could be used to make some stuff, like charcoal or glue.  You could eat it, but it will poison you.
//: Not for use in edible recipes, and should require ~200% as much as normal for applicable inedible recipes except for charcoal.

name: human bone
description: A bone from a human being.  Could be used to make some stuff, if you're feeling sufficiently ghoulish.
//: Not for use in normal food recipes.

name: tainted fat
description: A watery yellow glob of fat from some unnatural creature or other.  You could eat it, but it will poison you.
//: Not for use in edible recipes, and should require ~200% as much as normal for applicable inedible recipes.

name: tainted tallow
description: A smooth grayish block of cleaned and rendered monster fat.  It will remain 'fresh' for a very long time, and can be used as an ingredient in many projects.  You could eat it, but it will poison you.
//: Not for use in edible/foodsafe recipes.  Inefficiency is handled by tainted tallow recipe requiring 200% as much materials input as regular tallow recipe.

name: large boiled stomach
description: A boiled stomach from an animal, nothing else.  It looks all but appetizing.

name: boiled large human stomach
description: A boiled stomach from a large humanoid creature, nothing else.  It looks all but appetizing.

name: boiled stomach
description: A small boiled stomach from an animal, nothing else.  It looks all but appetizing.

name: boiled human stomach
description: A small boiled stomach from a human, nothing else.  It looks all but appetizing.

name: raw hide
description: A carefully folded raw skin harvested from an animal.  You can cure it for storage and tanning, or eat it if you're desperate enough.

name: tainted hide
description: A carefully folded poisonous raw skin harvested from an unnatural creature.  You can cure it for storage and tanning.

name: raw human skin
description: A carefully folded raw skin harvested from a human.  You can cure it for storage and tanning, or eat it if you're desperate enough.

name: raw pelt
description: A carefully folded raw skin harvested from a fur-bearing animal.  It still has the fur attached.  You can cure it for storage and tanning, or eat it if you're desperate enough.

name: tainted pelt
description: A carefully folded raw skin harvested from a fur-bearing unnatural creature.  It still has the fur attached and is poisonous.  You can cure it for storage and tanning.

name: seeping heart
description: A thick mass of flesh superficially resembling a mammalian heart, covered in dimpled grooves and the size of your fist.

name: putrid heart
description: A thick, hulking mass of flesh superficially resembling a mammalian heart, covered in ribbed grooves and easily the size of your head.  It's still full of, er, whatever passes for blood in jabberwocks, and is heavy in your hands.  After everything you've seen lately, you can't help but remember old sayings about eating the hearts of your enemies...

name: desiccated putrid heart
description: A huge strip of muscle - all that remains of a putrid heart that has been sliced open and drained of blood.  It could be eaten if you're hungry, but looks *disgusting*.
